Unfortunately I have no knowledge of the property hs_pdf_download_link (haven't worked with quotes), but I do think it has something to do with access rights.

If I want to grab an attached file from a CRM object I go with object, association, engagements and files API. Files/Engagements associated with CRM objects are usually "hidden_private" so you can't access them publicly. Try to use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files|Files API> with the endpoint "Get signed URL to access private file". This should generate a signed link to download the file.

Hello, I want to update custom and standard object properties of HubSpot while any changes occur in ServiceTrade. ServiceTrade offers API and webhooks.   Is it possible by using webhooks to update HubSpot properties without any custom app, is it possible to achieve this by HubSpot workflow. I am using HubSpot marketing and sales professional. Any guideline will be appreciated.
How can I get the list of contacts with their properties, through the api?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
use the properties parameter
get those contact properties
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/properties>
That is what was returned to me on a dev account with no custumization.
